message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount if you buy this round's product, but only if you agree to buy all 20 products. If you buy this round's product at the full price, I'll give you a 20% chance of getting a 10% discount on the next product, but only if you buy the next product at the full price as well.
